Class UserProfile

java.lang.Object
  com.compendium.core.datamodel.PCObject
      com.compendium.core.datamodel.IdObject
          com.compendium.core.datamodel.UserProfile
All Implemented Interfaces:
IIdObject, IPCObject, IUserProfile, ICoreConstants, java.io.Serializable
public class UserProfile
extends IdObject
implements IUserProfile, java.io.Serializable

This class represents a Compendium user profile Author Rema Natarajan / Michelle Bachler

String - sUserID, The unique identifier for this user.

UserProfile

public UserProfile(java.lang.String sUserID,
                   int nPermission,
                   java.lang.String sLoginName,
                   java.lang.String sUserName,
                   java.lang.String sPassword,
                   java.lang.String sUserDescription,
                   View oHomeView,
                   boolean bIsAdministrator)
Constructor.

Parameters:
String - sUserID, The unique identifier for this user.
int - nPermission, the permissions on this user.
String - sLoginName, the name used by this user to login.
String - sUserName, the name of the user used as the author name.
String - sPassword, the password used by this user to login.
String - sUserDescription, a description of this user.
View - oHomeView, the home view of this user.
boolean - bIsAdministrator, true if this user is an administrator, else false.

String - sPassword, the password used by this user to login.
String - sUserDescription, a description of this user.
View - oHomeView, the home view of this user.
boolean - bIsAdministrator, true if this user is an administrator, else false.
